vint-anys.metaDescription: 20 years is nothing. Clown and circus show for all ages. Two inseparable companions remember and stage their 20 years of career on stage. Illusion, fraternity and the passage of time acquire a special strength, as do human relationships, skills and complicity.

abstract.paragraph: Two inseparable companions remember and stage their 20 years of career on stage. Illusion, fraternity and the passage of time acquire a special strength, as do human relationships, skills and complicity.

list.title: 20 years is nothing
list.description: Clown show for all audiences, with constant tricks and mischief.

synopsis.paragraph: Makutu and Trinxeta combine different circus disciplines with clowning, using elements from everyday life that come to life in a very peculiar way: taking us from the past to the present and the future.

In a gesture of irony and at the same time affection towards the passage of time, the Filigranes Company makes a living, incisive and sincere self-portrait of two clowns who have grown up and made each other.

techCard.title: Dimensions
techCard.description: Outdoor minimum: 9.5m x 6m. Theatre minimum: 8m x 6m. Outdoor or theatre ideal: 11m x 8m.

techCard.title: Scenography
techCard.description: Backdrop and circular stage. Tent behind stage for outdoor.

techCard.title: Light and sound
techCard.description: 250v power outlet at stage level for 1000 watt sound equipment and 2 wireless microphones.

synopsis.paragraph: Plis Plas is a show where Toti and Makutu do not stop making the "knuckle": they are angry by hook or by crook, but friendship always ends up prevailing.
With a chair, a funnel or a bucket will make us, with its personal touch, classic gags combined with juggling and live music.

Welcome everyone !!!! Come on into The Filixic Circus: one of the smallest circuses in the world! Mr.Makutu, head of the historic "Filigranes Circus" goes to the track with another clown: the great Trinxeta!!
A story full of surprises, work of clowns, where different disciplines of the circus world are merged.
In an small village, between mountains, came an incredible circus, with their carriages, their caravans and...
...an amount of artists that we will have to discover together!
Trinxeta loves to travel and discover new worlds, he also likes the night sky and observing the stars. He is already determined, he wants to make a galactic flight through the different planets.
Do you dare to take a trip full of surprises? Well here we go!
Attention!!! Here they are! I feel the rhythm of the music that makes me move...
Oh!! They're so tall! You can see them coming from far away! Look how the musicians follow the Directore! From the instruments, well cleaned, the notes flow through streets and squares...

workshops.metaDescription: Workshops for all ages: circus, clowns, makeup, water tricks, soap bubbles...
workshops.claim: Workshops for little and adult people who want to learn and have fun!

hero.title: Workshops that stimulate the artist within you!
hero.alt: Image of the Filigranes Company Circus Workshop

synopsis.paragraph: Our passion for circus arises us to open its doors widely! We want to share this passion with you and give you the chance to get in touch with it in a fun and educational way.
In this workshop you will be able to try various techniques and disciplines of the circus world.
How is it possible?! A soap bubble bigger than your head! Do you want to do it with your own hands?
We'll fill all with soap bubbles of different sizes! We'll make you dance and fly! Come and discover this so peculiar and creative technique.
We introduce you the red nose! With it we will enter into the world of clowns, in humor, innocence and generosity.
We will learn to look with this nose, to use the body mask and build our own amusing character!
The facial art of fantasy allows us to create our own and unique character!
The skin will become our own mask and will help us to stimulate the imagination. So, when it ends... just look at the faces and get into the character!
Few things are as fun as playing with water! We will refresh and learn at the same time!
We will enjoy an itinerary with different stations, where youngsters and children will go through while practicing their skills in a funny way.
